additionalnotes.value: Adult dose should be based on ideal body weight or actual body weight, which ever is less. Adjust dose based upon creatinine clearance: If CrCl is greater than 50 mL/minute: usual dose every 8 hours. If CrCl is 25 to 50 mL/minute: usual dose every 12 hours. If CrCl is 10 to 25 mL/minute: usual dose once daily. If CrCl is less than 10 mL/minute: 50% of dose once daily.
If CrCl is 25 to 50 mL/minute, administer dose Q12H, if CrCl is 10 to 25 mL/minute, administer dose Q24H. If CrCl is less than 10 mL/minute, administer 50% of the dose Q24H.
